item.title: Amanda add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Pema Chodron
item.description: "Only to the extent that we expose ourselves over and over to annihilation can that which is indestructible be found in us." -- Pema Chodron

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "You expected to be sad in the fall. Part of you died each year when the leaves fell from the trees and their branches were bare against the wind and the cold, wintery light. But you knew there would always be the spring, as you knew the river would flow again after it was frozen. When the cold rains kept on and killed the spring, it was as though a young person died for no reason." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Franklin D. Roosevelt
item.description: "It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something." -- Franklin D. Roosevelt

item.title: Amanda add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "But who knows what she spoke to the darkness, alone, in the bitter watches of the night, when all her life seemed shrinking, and the walls of her bower closing in about her, a hutch to trammel some wild thing in?" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Maria Semple
item.description: "My heart started racing, not the bad kind of heart racing, like I'm going to die. But the good kind of heart racing, like, Hello, can I help you with something? If not, please step aside because I'm about to kick the shit out of life." -- Maria Semple

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in moderation, including moderation." -- Oscar Wilde
